area: For Coastal areas up to 60 nautical miles from Lerwick, Shetland (18)
warning: Strong to gale southeast flow and Atlantic troughs clearing to northeast mid-Monday. Low drifting east across you area later Monday.

forecast.wind: Southeast 6 to gale 8, veering south 4 to 6 later
forecast.sea: Rough occasionally very rough, but moderate in lee shelter of shetland
forecast.visibility: Moderate or good, occasionally poor at first
